dialogue.introduction: Admiral, I've attained a new form!
dialogue.library_intro: I get along very well with Mogamin, the first ship in the Mogami class, but we get along too well sometimes and collide often... Yeah... literally... I do watch where I'm going, okay?
dialogue.secretary1: I will be troubled if you believe that I am the same as before.
dialogue.secretary2: With this, I'll surely catch up to Mogamin.
dialogue.secretary3: Admiral, I wonder if you could please return my flight deck?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Really, Admiral... I thought you've forgotten about me.
dialogue.wedding: Admiral, for taking such great care of me up until now, my gratitude is boundless. Umm.. If it's okay, afterwards, together with Mikuma…. Kumarinko!
dialogue.show_players_score: Well, well! A new communique? Can I see it?
dialogue.equipment3: Would it be alright if I said 'Kumakuma'?
dialogue.expedition_selection: Would it be alright if I said 'Kumakuma'?
dialogue.resource_collection: Would it be alright if I said 'Kumakuma'?
dialogue.instant_repair: Would it be alright if I said 'Kumakuma'?
dialogue.development: Would it be alright if I said 'Kumakuma'?
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Please take special care with my flight deck.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Even though I though I fixed where Mogamin hit me.... I'm back in the dock...
dialogue.docking_complete: Reporting that the repair has been completed.
dialogue.ship_construction: I am informing you that a new ship has been completed.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet has returned safely, thank goodness...
dialogue.start_a_sortie: I want Mogamin to see this, my big performance!
dialogue.battle_start: Well now, lets begin my three-dimensional air AND surface actions!
dialogue.attack: Seaplanes, I'll leave this to you.
dialogue.night_battle: To be honest, nighttime is a little scary...
dialogue.night_attack: Next, the bombardment phase... Mi... Kuma!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Next, the bombardment phase... Mi... Kuma!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Next, the bombardment phase... Mi... Kuma!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Next, the bombardment phase... Mi... Kuma!
dialogue.mvp: Because the Admiral chose me, I could do my best! I humbly accept your gratitude.
dialogue.minor_damaged1: Just how angry will you make me!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Aaa... Kumarinko's western clothes..! That's too much!
dialogue.sunk: Please... Don't look... I don't want anyone... To see me while I sink...
dialogue.air_battle: Next, the bombardment phase... Mi... Kuma!

hourly.0100: 0100. Admiral, are you you going to be staying up late tonight?
hourly.0400: It is now 0400. Admiral, why don't you just go to bed?
hourly.0500: It's 0500. Admiral, if you work too hard, you damage your body.
hourly.0700: 0700. Admiral, what would you like for breakfast?
hourly.0800: 0800. Let's do our best together today as well, okay?
hourly.1100: 1100. What should would you like for lunch?
hourly.1200: 1200. I want to have lunch together~
hourly.1300: 1300. You always get tired after eating, don't you?
hourly.1500: 1500. Admiral, you're still holding strong here!
hourly.1700: 1700. Admiral, it's already evening, isn't it?
hourly.1800: 1800. Admiral, do you wish to go for dinner? Or perhaps, off for a drink?
hourly.1900: 1900. Well, Admiral, it is tasty? ...thank goodness.
hourly.2000: 2000. How about having a bath now?
hourly.2100: 2100. Is it okay for me to have a rest now?
hourly.2200: 2200. Admiral, it's almost time for that. Tha~t♪
hourly.2300: 2300. I did my best today as well.
